reviews.review_msg: The professor is great, she is passionate about teaching, BUT this course is so time-consuming. Attendance for the lecture is mandatory for getting good grades in the exams. There are verb quizzes every single class, so constant review is required. It is not an easy GPA booster course. I liked the vibe in the class, but wouldn't take it again.

Honestly, she's very amazing at teaching. She wants you to succeed in her class and gives you a lot of opportunities to learn and be engaged when in class. Attending tutorials is a must - that is where you learn. Tests are straight-forward and she explains what is to be expected, no surprises. Do all the work and take her advice - it helps a ton.

I am so glad I took german with Julia. She used to be a teacher in Germany and she is incredibly patient which is so important when learning another language. She also has a great sense of humour and is really caring which creates a great class atmosphere. I would absolutely recommend the class just know the vocab and really prepare for tests!
Julia is a nice person and the class is interesting as well. Learning the German grammar is sometimes not easy, but she can still be 100% patient and teach clearly enough for the lecture.

Julia is really friendly, helpful and easy going. Gives lots of good feedback as you try and stammer through your sentences. We didn't get to keep exams so it's difficult to get good feedback on your writing but that's a department thing. Overall an excellent Prof
